name: Bird Mania
description:
Faster and more addictive than Flappy Bird!

The hit 3DS game now on the App Store!

SLIDE your finger to fly past treetops, bushes and stinging bees. TAP and dash for crazy combos and collect bonuses to up your score right to the top as you zoom at the speed of lightning to the pumping music!

REVIEWS

◆ "Certainly has an addictive quality" – 148Apps
◆ "Nice visuals. Smooth performance. Simple and responsive touchscreen controls." – Gamezebo
◆ "If you like distance runner games, Bird Mania will please you." – AppAdvice
◆ "For a fast and fun score attack game, you really can't do any better." – NintendoLife

HIGHLIGHTS

◆ Don't just tap but also slide to steer!
◆ It's not yet another Flappy Bird clone but it's just as addictive!
◆ Game Center Leaderboards and Achievements
◆ Stunning retina graphics, optimized for an incredible iPhone 5 experience
◆ Dozens of improvements over the original 3DS chart-topper
◆ Universal iPhone and iPad game

Follow us at: www.facebook.com/BirdManiaGame and www.facebook.com/TeyonGames
